description: This Kotlin source file defines a RecyclerView adapter named RestaurantAdapter used in the Android frontend of a food delivery app. It manages displaying a list of restaurants, including their images, names, ratings, tags, ETA, and favorite status. The adapter handles item differentiation, view holder creation, and binding data to the UI components, as well as user interactions like toggling favorites and item clicks.

classes.name: RestaurantAdapter
classes.description: A RecyclerView ListAdapter managing Restaurant items, handling item diffing, view holder creation, and binding data including ratings, ETA, images, and favorite toggle functionality.

classes.name: VH
classes.description: A ViewHolder inner class that holds references to UI elements of the restaurant item view, used to bind restaurant data to the layout.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Inflates the item_restaurant layout and creates a VH ViewHolder.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds a Restaurant object to the ViewHolder, setting texts, images, background colors, content descriptions, and handling click events.
